      • 类 com.shapeville.main.MainFrame

        class MainFrame extends JFrame implements Serializable

        • 序列化字段

          • cardLayout
            CardLayout cardLayout
            The CardLayout manager for switching between different panels.
          • contentPaneContainer
            JPanel contentPaneContainer
            The main panel container that holds all switchable panels (cards).
          • navigationBar
            NavigationBar navigationBar
            The navigation bar component displayed at the top of the frame.
          • registeredPanels
            Map<String,JPanel> registeredPanels
            A map to store registered panels, with panel IDs as keys and panel instances as values.
          • scoreManager
            ScoreManager scoreManager
            The score manager instance handling scoring logic.
          • taskManager
            TaskManager taskManager
            The task manager instance handling task flow and logic.

      • 类 com.shapeville.task.sk2.Task4Panel

        class Task4Panel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • 序列化字段

          • answerField
            JTextField answerField
            Text field for user input of the calculated value.
          • areaButton
            JButton areaButton
            Button to select the Area calculation mode.
          • attemptsLabel
            JLabel attemptsLabel
            Label to display the number of attempts remaining.
          • attemptsUsed
            int attemptsUsed
            Number of attempts used for the current problem.
          • circleDrawingPanel
            com.shapeville.task.sk2.Task4Panel.CircleDrawingPanel circleDrawingPanel
            Custom panel for drawing the circle and labeling the given dimension.
          • circumferenceButton
            JButton circumferenceButton
            Button to select the Circumference calculation mode.
          • currentCorrectAnswer
            double currentCorrectAnswer
            The correct numerical answer for the current problem.
          • currentFormula
            String currentFormula
            The formula string for the current circle calculation problem.
          • currentIsArea
            boolean currentIsArea
            Flag indicating if the current problem is Area calculation (true) or Circumference (false).
          • doneAreaDiameter
            boolean doneAreaDiameter
            Flag indicating if the Area calculation with Diameter scenario is completed.
          • doneAreaRadius
            boolean doneAreaRadius
            Flag indicating if the Area calculation with Radius scenario is completed.
          • doneCircDiameter
            boolean doneCircDiameter
            Flag indicating if the Circumference calculation with Diameter scenario is completed.
          • doneCircRadius
            boolean doneCircRadius
            Flag indicating if the Circumference calculation with Radius scenario is completed.
          • formulaLabel
            JLabel formulaLabel
            Label to display the formula for the current circle calculation.
          • givenIsRadius
            boolean givenIsRadius
            Flag indicating if the given value for the current problem is Radius (true) or Diameter (false).
          • mainFrameRef
            MainFrame mainFrameRef
            Reference to the main application frame.
          • problemActive
            boolean problemActive
            Flag indicating if a problem is currently active.
          • questionLabel
            JLabel questionLabel
            Label to display the question or instructions for the current problem.
          • resultMessageLabel
            JLabel resultMessageLabel
            Label to display feedback or result messages.
          • submitButton
            JButton submitButton
            Button to submit the user's answer.
          • timeLabel
            JLabel timeLabel
            Label to display the remaining time.
          • timer
            Timer timer
            Timer for the task time limit.
          • timeRemaining
            int timeRemaining
            Remaining time in seconds for the current problem.
